basics.name: Kenneth Kebaara
basics.label: Full-Stack Software Developer, Data Analyst & Technology Entrepreneur
basics.summary:
I am a dynamic full-stack software developer, data analyst, and technology entrepreneur with over 10 years of experience architecting scalable web and mobile applications. My expertise spans React Native, Firebase, Ruby on Rails, modern JavaScript frameworks, and advanced data analytics.

As the founder of USA2Kenya, I have delivered innovative, user-focused solutions that seamlessly connect technology with business strategy. I am passionate about solving real-world challenges and excel at creating applications and analytics dashboards that drive user engagement and accelerate business growth.

My approach combines technical excellence with strategic insight, ensuring every project delivers measurable impact and value for users and organizations alike.

education.institution: University of St Thomas, Minneapolis, MN
Miami Ad School, South Beach, FL
University of St Thomas, Minneapolis, MN

work.summary: Founded and led development of a comprehensive resident engagement platform transforming property management through mobile-first experiences.
highlights: Built scalable React Native application serving multiple property types with real-time communication
Implemented Firebase backend architecture supporting thousands of users with 99.9% uptime
Reduced property management response times by 60% through automated workflows and digital tools
Led product strategy and technical architecture decisions for rapid market expansion

work.summary: Developed comprehensive fitness platform enabling personal trainers to scale their business through digital transformation.
highlights: Built custom WordPress platform with interactive workout builders and progress tracking
Integrated Stripe payment processing for seamless subscription and package billing
Implemented video streaming optimization for exercise demonstrations and tutorials
Increased client retention rates through consistent digital engagement tools

work.summary: Developed responsive marketing solutions positioning businesses in front of qualified customers through strategic digital presence.
highlights: Developed responsive websites with cross-browser and cross-device compatibility
Implemented SEO strategies and technical optimizations increasing organic traffic by 150%
Managed ongoing website maintenance including content updates and bug fixes
Collaborated with marketing teams to align technical solutions with business objectives

work.summary: Founded and built innovative e-commerce platform providing US mailing addresses for international shoppers, successfully serving hundreds of customers globally.
highlights: Architected and developed full-stack Ruby on Rails application with payment processing
Implemented complex logistics system managing international package forwarding
Built customer management system handling user onboarding, payments, and support
Successfully scaled business from concept to profitable operation with global customer base

work.summary: Developed innovative mobile application creating real photo emojis, managing cloud infrastructure and user-generated content.
highlights: Built mobile application for creating and sharing personalized photo emojis
Maintained AWS cloud infrastructure ensuring data integrity and system reliability
Collaborated on product development and feature ideation for user engagement
Managed company website serving as primary marketing channel for app promotion

work.summary: Contributed to healthcare software solutions development in agile environment, focusing on CRM applications and user communication systems.
highlights: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop healthcare-based software solutions
Worked in agile development environment delivering features according to business requirements
Built CRM application with SMS integration for automated user communication and data storage
Participated in code reviews and knowledge sharing to maintain high development standards
